modules.description: This module offers key-value operations such as insertion, deletion, lookup, and iteration over string-keyed maps, supporting custom comparisons and merging of entries. It handles arbitrary value types alongside string keys, enabling tasks like configuration management or dynamic data aggregation through mapping, filtering, and sequence conversions. Use cases include managing structured data, aggregating results, or processing symbolic information with flexible value types.

Generates a GraphQL query string, a variable constructor function, and a response parser function from a schema and query. Works with GraphQL schema introspection data and query syntax. Used to dynamically build and validate queries against a specific schema, then parse the resulting JSON into a typed OCaml structure.

provides string-keyed map operations with customizable comparisons and merging, enabling manipulation of arbitrary value types through insertion, deletion, lookup, and iteration. It supports data aggregation, configuration management, and symbolic processing by allowing mapping, filtering, and conversion of key-value sequences. Operations like merging two maps or transforming values through custom functions are directly supported. Examples include building dynamic configurations or processing query results with flexible data structures.
